translation: Knowledge, action, and actor are declared in the science of the Gunas (Sankhya philosophy) to be of three kinds only, according to the distinction of the Gunas. Of these, hear duly.
commentary: 18.19 Knowledge knowledge? Karma action? f and? Doer actor? f and? Tridha of three kinds? Eve only? according to the distinction of Gunas? prochyate are declared? Gunasankhyane in the science of Gunas (Sankhya philosophy)? As duly as possible? hear hear? Those them? Even also.Commentary The three alities overpower the whole of creation with their special nature and bring it entirely under their control.
